page.title: 18Family Life
page.content: {Population. }Many Salehurst School children have more than two siblings. A fair proportion have grandparents, uncles and aunts nearby. {Employment. }The majority of their fathers work locally.Some work in Robertsbridge on farms,in trade or at the Gypsum Mines.A lesser number commute to London.Mothers tend to work part time in the village. {Life Styles. }Many of the inhabitants of Robertsbridge have spent their whole lives there and it is a close knit community.Most of our children live in terraced houses or cottages, most have been abroad and have cars, videos or computers at home. {Recreation. }The most common family past-time is watching television. Swimming and walking is popular.At least half the children are involved in regular community activities.
